name: Turret Sector (itch)
description:
Turret Sector is an action packed 3D tower defence game and top down shooter; set within canyons on an alien planet.

Features -

• 2 game modes, Campaign Mode for those who want to play through each level in order, and Endless Mode for continuous play on any chosen level.

• 20 unique levels of sci-fi action, with each level consisting of several random waves.

• 35 interchangeable music tracks, composed by Michael La Manna.

• 6 enemy droid types, all having their own unique characteristics.

• 4 turret types, each designed with different powers, to help weaken and destroy enemy droids.

• The player has their own unique firepower of rapid ammunition fire and explosive missiles.

• The game auto-saves the player's score reached within each level as well as in-game statistics and player's setting options.

• 3 graphical quality settings, to allow the game to be player on a variety of different computer specifications.

• An in-game guide provides the player with recommendations for playing the game, as well as descriptions for each droid type.
